title: Oliver Twist
description: Born and brought up in the workhouse, the orphaned Oliver, having run away, has his famously fateful encounter with the Artful Dodger in the teeming streets of London, and thus falls into the hands of Fagin's gang of thieves. Although every effort is made to turn Oliver into an accomplished thief, he resists, finding temporary rescue in the form of Mr. Brownlow. Yet Oliver has many more trials to endure before the redemptive ending...
author: Charles Dickens
